### First Post
I'm hoping to make this the home of my blog.  Here's to hoping.

```
var i = 0;
while(i > -1){
  console.log("Buwahahahahaha!");
```

### Front-End Developer
I'm at front-end developer currently working at VML in Kansas City.  The job is great, and the coworkers are even better.

### Some of my favorite repos
* [Backbone.js](https://github.com/documentcloud/backbone)
* [Underscore.js](https://github.com/documentcloud/underscore)
* [idiomatic.js](https://github.com/rwldrn/idiomatic.js/)
name: Nordyke
